description: The ratings on this camera say that the ISO goes up very high, which is true. However, what they don't tell you is that the ISO is Automatic and there is no way to set it yourself in Manuel Mode.
name: Tonia Mccullough

description: Love it. I haven't taken pictures in a while. I have a 35mm Canon AE-1 camera that I've been using since the early 80's. I use digital but mostly with an IPhone. This is my big move to DSLR. Loving it
name: Lesley Robinson

description: The Canon Rebel T6 is also known as the 1300D throughout the world. Without getting too technical, this model is a great entry level camera for novice photographers to learn the art of photography.
name: Hartman Langley

description: Best DSLR on date pricewise. Features, compatibility, ease of use, speed, image & video quality and ergonomics are unbeatable for price. Amazing all rounder DSLR, Canon 77d.
name: Diann Kemp

description: Absolutely in love with the camera. I upgraded from a canon 500D and this body plus kit lens is an amazing combination. Club it with a tamron 70-300 and you have the kit of dreams.
name: Gertrude Humphrey

description: When I opened the package I see this product is used and I felt like returning it back but I need it for my vacation.Lenses is not properly covered with bubble wrap.
name: Clarke Olsen
